SELECT #{billYymm} AS BILL_YYMM, #{billCycl} AS BILL_CYCL, #{billDt} AS BILL_DT, #{exrateAplyDt} AS EXRATE_APLY_DT, #{payDueDt} AS PAY_DUE_DT, A.BILL_SEQ_NO, A.PROD_CMPS_ID, A.SVC_CMPS_ID, A.BILL_MM_TP, A.SO_ID, A.PYM_ACNT_ID, A.CTRT_ID, A.CRNCY_CD, A.SVC_CD, A.BIZ_CL, A.PROD_GRP, A.EXRATE, A.CHRG_ITM_CD, A.AUTO_DC_RATE, MAX(A.GRP_ID) AS GRP_ID, -- // 단체ID MAX(A.PROD_CD) AS PROD_CD, -- // 상품 MAX(A.CUST_ID) AS CUST_ID, -- // 고객ID MAX(A.SVC_GRP) AS SVC_GRP, -- // 서비스그룹 MAX(A.ATRT_CORP_ID) AS ATRT_CORP_ID, -- // 유치업체 MAX(A.ATRT_EMP_ID) AS ATRT_EMP_ID, -- // 유치사원 SUM(A.BILL_AMT) AS BILL_AMT, SUM(A.WON_BILL_AMT) AS WON_BILL_AMT, MAX(A.USE_YYMM) AS USE_YYMM, 0 AS USG_CNT, 0 AS USG_QTY, 0 AS USG_AMT, 0 AS RCPT_AMT, 0 AS ADJ_AMT, SUM(A.BILL_AMT) AS ADJ_PRV_BILL_AMT
FROM ( SELECT A.BILL_SEQ_NO, -- // 청구일련번호 A.BILL_MM_TP, -- // 당후납 구분 A.SO_ID, -- // 계열사ID A.PROD_CMPS_ID, -- // 상품구성ID A.SVC_CMPS_ID, -- // 서비스구성ID A.GRP_ID, -- // 단체ID A.PYM_ACNT_ID, -- // 납부계정ID A.CUST_ID, -- // 고객ID A.CTRT_ID, -- // 계약ID A.PROD_CD, -- // 상품코드 A.SVC_CD, -- // 서비스코드 A.BIZ_CL, -- // 사업구분 A.PROD_GRP, -- // 상품그룹 A.SVC_GRP, A.ATRT_CORP_ID, -- // 유치업체 A.ATRT_EMP_ID, -- // 유치사원 A.EXRATE, -- // 환율 TO_NUMBER(E.SET_VAL) AS AUTO_DC_RATE, --// 자동이체할인율 -TRUNC(A.BILL_AMT * TO_NUMBER(E.SET_VAL) / 100, 0) AS BILL_AMT, -TRUNC(A.WON_BILL_AMT * TO_NUMBER(E.SET_VAL) / 100, 0) AS WON_BILL_AMT, A.CRNCY_CD, F.REF_CODE AS CHRG_ITM_CD, A.USE_YYMM FROM TBLIV_BILL_WRK A, --// 청구내역 IFNBRM_CUST_INFO B, --// 납부계정 TBLIV_EXRATE_INFO C, --// 환율정보 IFNBRM_SVC_RATE_ITM_ATTR_INFO D, TBLIV_BILL_CYCL_STP E, TSYCO_CODE_DETAIL F, TBLCH_MULTI_SEQ Z WHERE A.BILL_YYMM = #{billYymm} --// 청구년월 AND A.BILL_CYCL = #{billCycl} --// 청구주기 AND A.BILL_DT = #{billDt} --// 청구일자 AND A.SO_ID = #{soId} AND A.SO_ID = B.SO_ID AND A.PYM_ACNT_ID = B.PYM_ACNT_ID -- // 납부계정 AND A.CUST_ID = B.CUST_ID AND B.PYM_MTHD IN ('02','04') -- // 납부방법('01': 지로, '02':자동이체, '04': 신용카드) MVNO CMS사용안함 AND A.CRNCY_CD = C.CRNCY_CD -- // 화폐코드 AND C.EXRATE_APLY_DT = #{exrateAplyDt} --// 환율기준일자 AND D.SVC_RATE_ITM_TYP_CD = A.CHRG_ITM_CD AND NVL(TO_NUMBER(E.SET_VAL),1) != 0 AND D.ATTR_CD = 'DF061' --// 자동이체 할인 여부 AND D.INACT_DT = '99991231' AND D.ATTR_VAL != '0' AND D.SO_ID = A.SO_ID AND A.BILL_AMT != 0 AND A.SO_ID = E.SO_ID AND '00020' = E.SET_ITM_ID --// 설정항목 :자동이체할인율 AND A.BILL_YYMM = E.BILL_YYMM AND A.BILL_CYCL = E.BILL_CYCL AND A.PAY_DUE_DT = #{payDueDt} AND F.COMMON_GRP = 'BL00000' AND F.COMMON_CD ='03' AND F.USE_YN = 'Y' AND Z.SO_ID = #{soId} AND Z.GUBUN = '2' AND Z.P_SEQ = #{pSeq} AND A.PYM_ACNT_ID >= Z.STRT_NO AND A.PYM_ACNT_ID <= Z.END_NO ) A GROUP BY A.BILL_SEQ_NO, A.PROD_CMPS_ID, A.SVC_CMPS_ID, A.BILL_MM_TP, A.SO_ID, A.PYM_ACNT_ID, A.CTRT_ID, A.CRNCY_CD, A.SVC_CD, A.BIZ_CL, A.PROD_GRP, A.EXRATE, A.CHRG_ITM_CD, A.AUTO_DC_RATE HAVING SUM(A.BILL_AMT) != 0 ORDER BY 1, 3, 2
